at.easydiet.teamc.controller.usecase
Class CreateRecipeController

java.lang.Object
  at.easydiet.teamc.controller.usecase.CreateRecipeController

public class CreateRecipeController
extends java.lang.Object

This controller creates recipes and evaluates the nutrimentparameters of the recipe, while in progress the controller uses NutrimentRules to evaluate wether the goal of the recipe is achieved with the current ingredients.

Author:
Stephan Svoboda

Method Detail

addParameter

public ValidatedRecipeVo addParameter(ParameterDefinitionData pdd,
                                      CheckOperatorData cod,
                                      double value,
                                      ParameterDefinitionUnitData pdud)
                               throws NutrimentRuleException
Adds a NutrimentRule to NutrimentRules and evaluates the recipe including the new rule. Returns the validated recipe.

Parameters:
pdd - ParameterDefinition for the new NutrimentRule.
cod - CheckOperator for the new NutrimentRule.
value - Boundary value to check by the new NutrimentRule.
pdud - ParameterDefintionUnit which is corespondending to the choosen value.
Returns:
ValidatedRecipeVo which has the information of the ingredients, all NutrimentParmeters, weight and information about the NutrimentRules.
Throws:
NutrimentRuleException - is thrown if the new NutrimentRule contradicts the existing NutrimentRules.

addRecipeIngredient

public ValidatedRecipeVo addRecipeIngredient(RecipeData d,
                                             ParameterDefinitionUnitData unit,
                                             float amount)
Adds a recipe as an ingredient to the recipe and evaluates the recipe with all NutrimentRules and calculates the new values for all NutrimentParameters.

Parameters:
d - recipe which is included as an ingridient.
unit - Unit of weight.
amount - Value of recipe weight.
Returns:
ValidatedRecipeVo which has the information of the ingredients, all NutrimentParmeters, weight and information about the NutrimentRules.

changeParameter

public ValidatedRecipeVo changeParameter(NutrimentParameterRuleData ndr,
                                         CheckOperatorData checkOperator,
                                         double value,
                                         ParameterDefinitionUnitData pdud,
                                         ParameterDefinitionData pdd)
                                  throws NutrimentRuleException
Changes an existing NutrimentRule to NutrimentRules and evaluates the recipe including the new rule. Returns the validated recipe.

Parameters:
pdd - ParameterDefinition for the changed NutrimentRule.
cod - CheckOperator for the changed NutrimentRule.
value - Boundary value to check by the changed NutrimentRule.
pdud - ParameterDefintionUnit which is corespondending to the choosen value.
Returns:
ValidatedRecipeVo which has the information of the ingredients, all NutrimentParmeters, weight and information about the NutrimentRules.
Throws:
NutrimentRuleException - is thrown if the new NutrimentRule contradicts the existing NutrimentRules.

changeRecipeIngredient

public ValidatedRecipeVo changeRecipeIngredient(float amount,
                                                RecipeData rd,
                                                ParameterDefinitionUnitData pdu)
Changes a recipe which is an ingredient of the recipe and evaluates the recipe with all NutrimentRules and calculates the new values for all NutrimentParameters.

Parameters:
d - recipe which is changed which is an ingridient.
unit - Unit of weight.
amount - Value of recipe weight.
Returns:
ValidatedRecipeVo which has the information of the ingredients, all NutrimentParmeters, weight and information about the NutrimentRules.

checkRecipe

private ValidatedRecipeVo checkRecipe()
Checks the recipe with all NutrimentRules and calulates all recipe values including all NutrimentParameters.

Returns:
ValidatedRecipeVo which has the information of the ingredients, all NutrimentParmeters, weight and information about the NutrimentRules.

removeParameter

public ValidatedRecipeVo removeParameter(NutrimentParameterRuleData param)
Removes an existing NutrimentRule from the NutrimentRuleSet.

Parameters:
param - Rule to remove.
Returns:
ValidatedRecipeVo which has the information of the ingredients, all NutrimentParmeters, weight and information about the NutrimentRules.

removeRecipeIngredient

public ValidatedRecipeVo removeRecipeIngredient(RecipeData rd)
Removes an ingredient from the recipe and calculates all new recipe specific values.

Parameters:
rd - Ingredient to remove.
Returns:
ValidatedRecipeVo which has the information of the ingredients, all NutrimentParmeters, weight and information about the NutrimentRules.

save

public void save(java.lang.String recipeName,
                 java.lang.String preparation,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 java.lang.String benefits,
                 double preperationTime,
                 int difficulty)
Saves the recipe into database.

Parameters:
recipeName - Name of the recipe.
preparation - Cooking instruction of the recipe.
description - Description of the recipe.
benefits - Benefits of the recipe.
